attributes.additional_details:
It is time for the Government to put an end to young people not being in work or education.

It is time for the UK to become a better place and this won't happen while young people are allowed to do nothing, then fall into the trap of drugs, gangs, crime & violence.

There are talso too many people in prison.  By bringing back National Service it will help reduce this amount and give those that do it a sense of achievement, confidence, skills and something to strive for.
